channel.title: Oakley Twin Shock OX3095 – Men’s Designer Glasses
channel.description: Did you know Oakley started out in a garage? The owner started the company with only $300. Now Oakley make glasses for people around the world from celebrities to sportsmen and fashionistas. Bought out by Luxottica, their reputation has boosted Oakley to luxury brand status. The company was named after Jannard’s pet dog, Oakley, back [...]
